q: of Defense Donald Rumsfeld describes a George H. W. Bush administration marred by chaos and disorder during the months leading up to the Iraq War- the prime reason, he says, why the postwar transition was so poorly planned. There were far too many hands on the steering wheel, which, in my view, was a formula for running the truck into a ditch, writes Donald Rumsfeld in Known and Known, which is set to hit bookstores next week. the deal that sent veteran forCharlie Ward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers.`` We're excited about( Keon Clark ),'' Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Baron Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplessly as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation. Michael Vick 's got it all at this point,'' Eagles offensive coordinator href="http://content.usatoday.com/topics/topic/Marty Mornhinweg+Marty Mornhinweg" title="More news, photos about Marty Mornhinweg"> Marty Mornhinweg said. Really, the most important quality, in my opinion, for a quarterback to have is gut instincts, then comes the decision-making and the timing and accuracy. Then comes the big arm and athleticism and those types of things. The gut instincts are critical for a quarterback, and you can see that. Not only did Michael Vick make a remarkable turnaround on the field, but his image is improving away from the game.
